org.apache.thrift.transport
Class TDataTransport

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport
      org.apache.thrift.transport.TDataTransport

public class TDataTransport
extends TTransport

May become a standard Thrift class at some point. For now, we've adapted it from the Thrift issue here: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/THRIFT-1012

Constructor Summary
protected TDataTransport()
          Subclasses can invoke the default constructor and then assign the input streams in the open method.

          Input stream constructor.

          Output stream constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          No ability to close IO.
 void flush()
          Can't flush IO, this method does nothing
 boolean isOpen()
          The streams must already be open at construction time, so this should always return true.
 void open()
          The streams must already be open.

          Reads from the underlying input stream if not null.

isOpen

public boolean isOpen()
The streams must already be open at construction time, so this should always return true.
